testcase.name: Home page with Login
testcase.system-out: Given The home page Url.....................................................passed When User is on CRM page the page title is FreeCRM..........................passed Then User entered Username and Password.....................................passed Then User Clicks on login button............................................passed Then Now user in home page the title is CRMPRO..............................passed Then Moves to new task page.................................................passed Then User enters title and select deadline_day, deadline_month,deadline_year,deadline_hour,deadline_minute,status,completion%,Type, case, ownerassinedto..passed Then Click on Save..........................................................passed
